title: ‘I Don’t Have Anything to Lose’: Mark Cavendish One Sprint Away from Tour de France Legend Status
content:
'We have everything in place to do it': Mark Cavendish plays down pressure as hype builds ahead of Tour de France chase to break the Eddy Merckx record of 34 victories.

Read the full article at ‘I Don’t Have Anything to Lose’: Mark Cavendish One Sprint Away from Tour de France Legend Status on Velo.
author: ahood
